snippet.title: HOVERLOOP - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play NOW on Steam Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/613620/Hoverloop/

Hoverloop is a multiplayer arena shooter that features customizable hover drones in high-speed combat.
​
Players take their mechanized gladiators into a battle for glory,
across a multitude of maps and game modes including Deathmatch and wave-based PvE.

Both the drones’ abilities and appearance can be personalized to their owner’s preferences.
Powerful abilities like laser wheels, death rays, invulnerable shields and teleportation let you pick your playstyle.

Enjoy the Local Multiplayer with up to 4 Player split-screen or the Online Multiplayer with up to 8 combatants. Who will rise to the top of the charts?

Follow us:
https://www.not-a-company.com/
https://twitter.com/HoverloopNAC
https://www.facebook.com/Hoverloop/

Steam & Xbox Release: Fall 2019
